Retina Retina narrow-field AII amacrine.Definition: This subtype of amacrine (no axon) cell "sends a thick stalk to the ON level of the inner plexiform layer where it arborizes richly to collect chemical synapses from rod bipolar terminals" (Sterling and Demb, Syn Org of the Brain, p. 223).  It also has numerous gap junctions with cone ON bipolar cell terminals.
